methods.JSONObject accumulate(String name, Objec: Appends value to the array already mapped to name.
methods.Object get(String name): Returns the value mapped by name, or throws if no such mapping exists.
methods.boolean getBoolean(String name): Returns the value mapped by name if it exists and is a boolean or can be coerced to a boolean, or throws otherwise.
methods.double getDouble(String name): Returns the value mapped by name if it exists and is a double or can be coerced to a double, or throws otherwise.
methods.int getInt(String name): Returns the value mapped by name if it exists and is an int or can be coerced to an int, or throws otherwise.
methods.JSONArray getJSONArray(String name): Returns the value mapped by name if it exists and is a JSONArray, or throws otherwise.
methods.JSONObject getJSONObject(String name): Returns the value mapped by name if it exists and is a JSONObject, or throws otherwise.
methods.long getLong(String name): Returns the value mapped by name if it exists and is a long or can be coerced to a long, or throws otherwise.
methods.String getString(String name): Returns the value mapped by name if it exists, coercing it if necessary, or throws if no such mapping exists.
methods.boolean has(String name): Returns true if this object has a mapping for name.
methods.boolean isNull(String name): Returns true if this object has no mapping for name or if it has a mapping whose value is NULL.
methods.Iterator keys(): Returns an iterator of the String names in this object.
methods.int length(): Returns the number of name/value mappings in this object.
methods.JSONArray names(): Returns an array containing the string names in this object.
methods.String numberToString(Number number): Encodes the number as a JSON string.
methods.Object opt(String name): Returns the value mapped by name, or null if no such mapping exists.
methods.boolean optBoolean(String name, boolean: Returns the value mapped by name if it exists and is a boolean or can be coerced to a boolean, or fallback otherwise.
methods.boolean optBoolean(String name): Returns the value mapped by name if it exists and is a boolean or can be coerced to a boolean, or false otherwise.
methods.double optDouble(String name, double fal: Returns the value mapped by name if it exists and is a double or can be coerced to a double, or fallback otherwise.
methods.double optDouble(String name): Returns the value mapped by name if it exists and is a double or can be coerced to a double, or NaN otherwise.
methods.int optInt(String name, int fallback): Returns the value mapped by name if it exists and is an int or can be coerced to an int, or fallback otherwise.
methods.int optInt(String name): Returns the value mapped by name if it exists and is an int or can be coerced to an int, or 0 otherwise.
methods.JSONArray optJSONArray(String name): Returns the value mapped by name if it exists and is a JSONArray, or null otherwise.
methods.JSONObject optJSONObject(String name): Returns the value mapped by name if it exists and is a JSONObject, or null otherwise.
methods.long optLong(String name): Returns the value mapped by name if it exists and is a long or can be coerced to a long, or 0 otherwise.
methods.long optLong(String name, long fallback): Returns the value mapped by name if it exists and is a long or can be coerced to a long, or fallback otherwise.
methods.String optString(String name, String fal: Returns the value mapped by name if it exists, coercing it if necessary, or fallback if no such mapping exists.
methods.String optString(String name): Returns the value mapped by name if it exists, coercing it if necessary, or the empty string if no such mapping exists.
methods.JSONObject put(String name, double value: Maps name to value, clobbering any existing name/value mapping with the same name.
methods.JSONObject put(String name, boolean valu: Maps name to value, clobbering any existing name/value mapping with the same name.
methods.JSONObject put(String name, int value): Maps name to value, clobbering any existing name/value mapping with the same name.
methods.JSONObject put(String name, long value): Maps name to value, clobbering any existing name/value mapping with the same name.
methods.JSONObject put(String name, Object value: Maps name to value, clobbering any existing name/value mapping with the same name.
methods.JSONObject putOpt(String name, Object va: Equivalent to put(name, value) when both parameters are non-null; does nothing otherwise.
methods.String quote(String data): Encodes data as a JSON string.
methods.Object remove(String name): Removes the named mapping if it exists; does nothing otherwise.
methods.JSONArray toJSONArray(JSONArray names): Returns an array with the values corresponding to names.
methods.String toString(): Encodes this object as a compact JSON string, such as:
methods.String toString(int indentSpaces): Encodes this object as a human readable JSON string for debugging, such as:
methods.Object wrap(Object o): Wraps the given object if necessary.
